name: Fontecruz Lisboa, Autograph Collection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013
reviews.text: This hotel has a great location it was very nearby to everything we wanted to see and do. We could walk to most things our a train station was very near. You would not even know it a hotel by just walking by.. Our room was upgraded by the very efficient receptionist J. Hotel was quiet most of the time but they did have a few fashion week events going on when we there. The restaurant had a great farm to table style setting which I thought was cute. We wood recommend this hotel to others
reviews.title: Artsy hip chic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights on a trip to Lisbon. We chose it as it was a Marriott and we wanted to earn points, but also because it didn’t look like the classic Marriott that could be any city, in any country. It’s one of their new Autograph collection and you’d never have known it was Marriott at all! It’s funky and modern and kept very clean. We both liked it!
reviews.title: Great location, nice modern hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The pictures on the website do accurately reflect it’s style and what it looks like. Front desk team were extremely friendly and very helpful and often would chat with you to find out what you were planning to do that day or see what you’d done on the way back! They didn’t hide behind the desk, which I thought was nice. Francisco was charming.
reviews.title: Affordable 5 star boutique hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: Breakfast was lovely and something slightly different – always a bonus when you travel a lot! It felt very low key and relaxed.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in Lisbon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The rooms are modern and trendy in style. Bed large and very comfortable. We had one of the darker painted rooms, which was very spacious, with a really high ceiling and a lovely view to the front of the main tree lined avenue – where we heard no road noise to disturb us - they must be thick windows. In hindsight I think I’d have preferred one of the white rooms, as they would be brighter. My only alteration to the darker painted rooms would be a glitzy crystal chandelier to match the décor (something like the ones from downstairs to make the room a bit brighter!). We did have a very leaky shower, but as only one other recent guest mentioned this on trip advisor I think this was just an issue with our one (they perhaps were in the same room!). Our room had shower only. These comments are why I’ve given it a very good rating, not excellent. The safe in the room was large and someone else also pointed out the power goes off when the room key is removed.
reviews.title: great location and rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The Fontecruz Lisboa, Autograph Collection entire staff treated me with the courtesy and attention you expect from a fine hotel. The service and food was excellent and the atmosphere was friendly with all members of staff making me feel very welcome at all times.
reviews.title: 5 Star Hotel in a Excellent Location!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here with my girlfriend for 4 nights this week and the impression was mixed.
reviews.title: Fantastic Location... Hotel has some flaws...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I loved the dark, modern design, with quirky features here and there. The rooms were a good size and the bed was fantastic, the most comfortable I've experienced in a hotel room. Despite being on one of Lisbon's main avenues you couldn't hear the road at all.
reviews.title: not at the level I was expecting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: However while the sound proofing to the road was excellent, internally it was terrible. We could hear what next door were watching on tv (football in German mostly) and every word said in the hallway. We also made the mistake of ordering room service one night after a long day and it arrived cold (raw in the case of my burger) and then the replacement toastie arrived cold too.
reviews.title: Great Location, comfortable rooms and excellent staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got a great deal on the room so the shortcomings didn't feel so disappointing, but were we paying full price for the room I would have been unimpressed.
reviews.title: Dark minimalist decor, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all, the hotel is "good" to "very good," in all categories.
reviews.title: Very good, but not a 5 star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Which means it wasn't "excellent" in any.
reviews.title: "Interesting" - Unusual but Terrific

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Room - on a smaller side, even with an upgrade. I understand standard rooms are even smaller.
reviews.title: Excellent front desk service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not tiny, especially by European standards, but deluxe rooms in 5-stars are typically bigger and better appointed.
reviews.title: I really (really) love this hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast - OK, not too much variety. Again, no one went hungry...but I'd expect more.
reviews.title: Great location but...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Fontecruz is a welcome new addition to the Marriott Autograph Collection. The location could not be better as it is centrally located on the Avenida Liberdade. It is advertised as boutique-chic and definitely fulfills that description. The hotel is very contemporary and unique in all aspects. While management is still working out some of the details of belonging to the Marriott Group, this is a place to which we shall definitely return.
reviews.title: Great Location for a Marriott Autograph Collection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013
reviews.text: This is one of the few boutique hotels that enjoyed every singld day of my stay in Lisboa. The Staff is super helpful, I shipped 5 big boxes from Massimo Dutti to the hotel and they kindly kept all of them until my arrival. Thr rooms are super modern, big and comfy, featuring awesome bathroom and amnesties. Since I am a gold member, I am entitled to a free continental breakfast which had an excellent choice of fresh fruits, healthy goods, yummy cheese, variety of jamon, and drinks. I will definitely come back to Lisboa and stay at this hotel! Highly recommended for its best location and quality.
reviews.title: In love with Fontecruz!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Fontecruz in Lisbon is located in the perfect part of town, on a tree-lined boulevard with shops and restaurants, and within walking distance of the central train station. The rooms were large by European standards, and the entire hotel was designed with a cool, modern vibe.
reviews.title: Very cool boutique Lisbon Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The best part of the experience was the hotel's staff, who went out of their way to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable. Whether it was for directions, ice, power converters or restaurant recommendations, they were more than pleased to help. Especially Rui.
reviews.title: Unique Hotel - Great Night's Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: This is a Marriott-affiliated property, so if you're looking for a fantastic hotel who treats you like an important guest even when using points, check out the Fontecruz.
reviews.title: Great Staff and location

description: A brand new boutique hotel recently opened in the very city center of Lisbon with a primer location on the Liberdade Av. It offers 72 luxurious rooms and suites decorated in a fashion and chic style. Its open lounge terrace offers panoramic views on the city center and chill out atmosphere. The hotel restaurant prides on its modern, light and fresh cuisine, and its Gin Tonics carte.
